ID: C1PXU5V_00
From: One Reach <OneReach@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-07-08 16:59
Subject: Notification: Migration D3 share drives from On-premise server to Azure D3 server
--------------------------------------------------
 <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/> 

 

Dear Colleague,

We have scheduled the migration of the following file shares from the D3-fileserver to the cloud based Azure fileserver VMAZ-UAEN-FS2 to ensure file availability.

Please be aware that during the below period, access to the shares hosted on D3-fileserver will not be available.

 

Maintenance start time: Fri, 11 Jul 2025, 7:00 PM GST

Maintenance end time: Mon, 14 Jul 2025, 00:00 AM GST

 

* IMPORTANT PREPARATION INFORMATION *

To prevent any disruption following the migration, we suggest creating and keeping a list of your currently mapped network drives before the above maintenance commences. This will ensure that all drives can be re-mapped to your PC once they are migrated to the new cloud server.

Kindly follow these instructions to check your currently mapped drives.

*	Open File Explorer (Windows key + E).
*	Select "This PC" in the left pane.
*	The mapped network drives will be listed under "Network". 
*	Please note down the names of these drives until after the migration.

*	Open File Explorer (Windows key + E).
*	Select "This PC" in the left pane.
*	The mapped network drives will be listed under "Network". 
*	Please note down the names of these drives until after the migration.

Click here to view the full list of current share statuses <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/a/solutions/articles/52000129600?language=en> 

 If you are unable to view your shared folder after migration, please follow the steps below to reconnect:

________________________________

To regain access to your mapped drive following migration:

1.	Press Windows Key (ðŸªŸ) + R on your keyboard
2.	In the Run dialog box, type: \\vmaz-uaen-fs2\ <file://vmaz-uaen-fs2/>  and click OK
3.	A list of shared folders will appear â€” locate your specific folder (as per the list you created)
4.	Right-click the folder and select Map Network Drive
5.	Confirm or choose a Drive Letter (e.g., J:)
6.	Click Finish

Your shared folder will now appear under â€˜This PCâ€™ in File Explorer.

We appreciate your patience and cooperation as we work to enhance your experience with our services.


For further support, please raise a ticket via OneReach. You can also check real-time status updates via the Tech&Data System Status & Health <https://onereach.status.freshservice.com/>  Dashboard.

 

 

 

This mail was sent to you by

 <https://onereach.chalhoub.com/support/home>
